name: Greedy Mercenary
description:
Even in medival ages everyone wanted to be rich. And one brave knight finds himself in the middle of a dangerous journey of collecting gold coins.

Greedy Mercenary - 3D runner with a third-person view in which you have to control the knight. Run as far as possible while collecting as many gold coins as possible. Run as long as you can on the way to wealth and complete the goal of the knight!

Game Features:
- Visual style
- 3D World
- Difficulty
